title: ZAC NEEDS A BUFF AND IT REALLY NEEDS TO HAPPEN
body:
Honestly, ive been playing zac for a few years now, pre-rework, post rework and even to this day, but hes lacking that potential to really snowball your team, hes really weak early with no real source of damage if he gets invaded, hes already at low health when hes jungling maybe, just maybe.. we could buff his w to deal extra damage if low HP (below 25-10%). 
Or some other form of damage output potential, his AP scaling is abysmal unless you build full AP but then he gets blown up if he does, i would maybe like to see some AD scaling on his Q, it would make some sense coz hes yeeting his arm at people, i just find his kit is lacking damage and would love to see Riot Games do something with him in terms of buffing him.
**Let me know your thoughts community!**

replies.body: He is certainly very weak and has been for a while.  Pro play got him nerfed, but he has hardly seen pro play this season.  With luck he might get something.
